General.Name: Sasbadi Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Sasbadi Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, publishes books and educational materials primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through Print Publishing; Digital Solutions and Network Marketing; and Applied Learning Products and STEM Education Services segments. It publishes national primary and secondary school materials, such as textbooks, revision books, workbooks, assessment books, model test papers, and readers; course books and activity books for preschools, childcare centers, and nurseries; titles for form six students and Malaysian University English Test candidates; and titles and materials for trainee-teachers. The company also publishes supplementary educational materials, which include fiction and non-fiction titles, comics, illustrated storybooks, young adult literatures, dictionaries, and internationally renowned titles; and novels, short stories, poems, and biographies. In addition, it provides digital education solutions and in-house apps, including quiz games, topical challenges, and other educational games; i-LEARN Ace, a mobile learning platform for year 1 to form 5 students; Tutor2U, an e-tuition and learning resources platform through which students can attend live classes and subscribe to learning materials; systems that allow teachers and school management to cluster their classes through a cloud-based portal, assess students individually and view their records, track students' progress, and assign work and grade to students. Further, the company offers education services through Little Botz, a learning center where children can take practical lessons in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM). Additionally, it trades in papers and printed materials, organize book fairs and exhibitions, markets online/digital educational products, and distributes applied learning products. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
